originalText.text: For the past three years I have been going to Silhouette MD Aesthetics & Wellness for botox. Dr. Sartawi does amazing work. She listens to my concerns and will treat accordingly. She really makes me feel comfortable and she takes time to explain each procedure. I am very pleased and I will continue to do my botox with her for a long time. Thank You!

originalText.text: Dr. Sartawi at Silhouette MD is Amazing! She really is the go-to for botox. She is extremely professional. I have been going to her for the past 3 years. Her line of helping clients with skin concerns is extensive. The office décor is great and the staff is welcoming and warm. My personal experience with Dr. Sartawi and Silhouette MD has been nothing short of pleasant, so Thank You!

originalText.text: I recently went to Silhouette MD Aesthetics & Wellness to get Botox for my forehead and crows feet. The providers explained the options to me. The best thing about this place was their caring manner. I highly recommend Silhouette MD Aesthetics & Wellness for Botox. They are the best!

text.text: I recently went to Silhouette MD Aesthetics & Wellness to get Botox for my forehead and crows feet. The providers explained the options to me. The best thing about this place was their caring manner. I highly recommend Silhouette MD Aesthetics & Wellness for Botox. They are the best!

originalText.text:
All I can say is WOW! I had such an amazing experience at this Medical Spa. It's a brand new facility which is owned by an actual doctor so you are not dealing with anyone else except the doctor. She is actually pretty cool and really understands what you want and works with you. I was literally blown away with how well they treated me here. I will not go to any other place now. I got a laser treatment done for my face and I have been glowing ever since. So many people have asked me what I did to my skin. =)

Dr. Sartawi is very professional and makes you feel so comfortable!!

originalText.text: I highly recommend Silhouette MD. I saw Dr. Sartawi who is very knowledgeable, friendly, and very thorough. She takes her time so you definitely won’t get a rushed service. She pointed out some things about my lips that my previous surgeon didn’t. I am very happy with my lip fillers and will definitely get it done again with Dr. Sartawi.
